li.a: Educational Service Center of Lorain County

a.span: Election Update: Vote By Mail Information

div.span: Starting on Monday, April 6 breakfast and lunch meals will only be distributed on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday from 8-10am to families in need. These meals will include multiple days of food. We are making this change to help limit the risk to staff and families, and in accordance with social distancing requirements.
